transcript.text:
￼





Frequently Asked Questions
Shipping & Taxes

6 min
shipping shipping is it possible to assign a product wise shipping method? is it possible to assign a product wise shipping method? yes, it is possible to assign product wise shipping methods with the " product specific shipping " option with this, you can assign shipping methods to all or selected products what are shipping markup and markup rules? what are shipping markup and markup rules? admin can add markups and create markup rules on the shipping prices after configuring shipping types and settings you can add markup and delivery days for the third party shipping methods only how can i manage incorrect delivery addresses? how can i manage incorrect delivery addresses? for the usa region, we offer address validation feature this will help you to overcome the issues faced with false addresses if the shipping gateway integrated into your system offers address validation service, then it will be listed in the dropdown next, you’ll have to configure all the required details of the selected shipping method contact the support and technical team at support\@onprintshop com to get help in the integration of the address validation service what shipping methods are used for "address validation service"? what shipping methods are used for "address validation service"? third party shipping like ups or fedex is used for “address validation service” can i add tracking numbers to shipping notifications? can i add tracking numbers to shipping notifications? yes, you can add a tracking number to orders and send shipping notifications click on the pencil like icon to update the order and enter the tracking number after selecting the shipping method and shipping type you can see also add a tracking number to the orders while creating shipping labels via the third party shipping method can i make shipping zones country wise, state/provinces, or zipcode wise? can i make shipping zones country wise, state/provinces, or zipcode wise? yes, you can create shipping zones country wise, states/provinces, or zipcode wise for this, you need to set the value of setting – shipping price setup based on as country and state (cs) to create the shipping zones as multiple states/provinces in different countries, check the zone management section what is the difference between the shipstation shipping method and shipstation fulfillment api? what is the difference between the shipstation shipping method and shipstation fulfillment api? the shipstation shipping method works similarly to any other third party shipping services provider such as ups or fedex it helps in displaying the shipping cost, generating shipping labels, and providing the tracking number on the other hand, the shipstation fulfillment api allows the admin to sync the orders via xml and fulfill the order delivery from the shipstation dashboard you can learn how to integrate the api with your ops store from our integration guide taxes taxes how can i charge taxes on shipping? how can i charge taxes on shipping? if you are looking to charge taxes on shipping prices, then while adding a tax enable the setting – calculate on shipping price? this will calculate tax on product subtotal as well as on shipping prices can i set taxes as per location? can i set taxes as per location? you can set tax rates in different ways – flat tax rate, country wise, state wise (country and state), or area wise (country and zip code) it is advisable to refer to a local tax authority or a tax accountant to make sure you charge correct tax rates from your customers, and also you file and pay the taxes correctly to get information on how to add taxes location wise refer to our tax and vat page is it possible to exempt customer/store clients from the taxation cycle? is it possible to exempt customer/store clients from the taxation cycle? if you are serving certain kinds of customers whom you don’t want to include in the taxation cycle, then you can exempt them for every customer in action menu >> edit you’ll find a tax exempt setting enabling the setting will remove the customers from the taxation cycle and they'll not be charged for any taxes similarly, for store under action menu >> edit you’ll find a setting allow tax exemption enabling it will make all the store customers tax free

Updated 11 Jun 2025
